com.github.maven_nar.cpptasks.openwatcom

Class OpenWatcomLibrarian

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maven_nar.cpptasks.compiler.AbstractProcessor
      • com.github.maven_nar.cpptasks.compiler.AbstractLinker

          • com.github.maven_nar.cpptasks.openwatcom.OpenWatcomLibrarian
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Linker, Processor, Cloneable

    public final class OpenWatcomLibrarian
extends CommandLineLinker
    Adapter for the OpenWatcom Librarian.
    Author:
    Curt Arnold
